predicate.note: Frames file for 'identify' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison with 'label' et al.

roleset.name: label, call

example.name: passivized, with LONG trace chain
example.text: ``We're being paid today, but we're worried about tomorrow and will want'' letters of credit, says the sales director at one major dress maker who *trace-1* asked *trace-2* not to be identified *trace-3*.

roleset.note: I wonder if that *trace-2* really should be in there, but that's the chain that treebank provides.

example.name: with attribute
example.text: ``A lot of people are identifying a vote for representation as a vote against Fred Smith,'' says J.X. Gollich, a Tiger-turned-Federal pilot and union activist.
John identified with the lonely monkey at the zoo.
